name: Crawdaunt ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_power.name: Splash Back
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), if your opponent has 4 or more Benched Pokémon, you may choose 1 of them and return that Pokémon and all cards attached to it to his or her hand. This power can’t be used if Crawdaunt ex is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.effect: Does 20 damage times the amount of Energy attached to Crawdaunt ex.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
